task.title: Validating your XML test script - Did I get it right?

prerequisites.p: Before validating an XML test script, you should:

ul.li: Have or create a library folder-name.xml and *.htm file.
Set up the XML authoring tools.
Review the structure of a test case library.
Review our general description of XML.

guidelines.p: Here are some guidelines for validating an XML test script:

ul.li: Make sure the folder-name.xml has an <insert-test> element for the test script to be validated.
Double click the library *.htm file to launch the browser. All of the test scripts in the library should appear in the browser. At least one is needed for a valid test script library.
Trouble-shoot the library if errors are issued or if you get an indented list with "-" signs in front of some lines or if nothing shows up on the screen.
